News Flash

  1. Peddlers & Solicitors Permits

    Read on...

  2. The City of El Paso is no longer accepting glass for recycling.

    The City of El Paso is no longer accepting glass for recycling. Currently the vendor that picks up the glass is not able to accept it. **Please dispose of glass in your own garbage. **Do NOT leave any glass at the recycling facility.

  3. EPIC Committee

    EPIC is a newly formed organization - the El Paso Involvement Committee - and our mission is to help our community be involved in our community. Our first goal is to create a Community Calendar of events with all goings-on that are open to the public. Read on...

http.html:
+myConnections: Engage your community - connect to news, events and information you care about.    View more information...

  • Sign In

Welcome to an Engaged Community

There's a better way to personalize your website experience. With myConnection, the profile you create allows you to set up a unique starting point for the tasks and transactions that you want to complete in your time on this website. Use myConnection to gather the information that you most care about from across this website into one central location, giving you greater control over how you connect with your community.
